Wenn im selbem Jahr nicht "The Eldar Scrolls 5 : Skyrim" rausgekommen wäre, wäre dieses Spiel mein Game of the Year 2011.

Und scheiße nochmal er hat recht.

Great Game; well made, after the map-builder update its replayable to gain some insperation from the original tests. But on a little light note, the whole game seems like a taunt from Valve: "So yeah, Aperture Science does exist in the Half-Life universe and it is THIER ship (the Borialus) that Dr. Mossmen found. But we are just going to mosey around and not tell you anything more and not let you see anything but the dry dock where it was made..." Sure the game gives you alot more Back story about Aperture and who created it, and why it is what it is at the present time. But all sarcasim aside; Valve should have added more Half-Life connetions. All-n-all though, its a pretty sweet game.

Davvero divertente, giocato in co-op poi è uno spasso, consigliato caldamente al 100%  :)

E' un gioco davvero geniale e originale. Hanno migliorato notevolmente la grafica e gli enigmi. Ho apprezzato molto l'introduzione dei vari gel, ponti e colonne energetiche ecc... Un gioco indubbiamente divertente anche per l'ironia di fondo dei robot.  La modalità cooperativa è molto bella. Un gioco che consiglio senza ombra di dubbio. 

Voto: 9

Innovative.  Fun.  Claustrophobic.  Funny.  Is it a commentary on the abysmal trap of playing too many video games?  Is it a commentary on the abusive mother/daughter relationship?  Is it a coming of age story?  Or is it just a way to finally get Gordon Freeman another girlfriend!  IDK.  But it sure is enjoyable.
Just awesome!! A must need if you own the first one and love puzzle games ;)
Bloody brilliant! Even better than the first. Highly recommended.
If you don't own this game go get your head examined.
excellent, encore meilleur que le premier

Wenn man bedenkt, dass Portal 1 eigentlich nur eine beiläufige Entwicklung war, konnte man kaum davon ausgehen, dass sich dadraus mehr entwickelt. Valve hat wieder einmal gezeigt wie man Spiele macht und liefert mit Portal 2 einen würdigen Nachfolger zum ersten Teil ab. 

Im Gegensatz zum ersten Teil bekommt man hier einiges von der Hintergrundgeschichte mit. Die neuen Elemente, darunter auch die verschiedenen Gels sind einfach der Hammer!

Das gannze Spiel wird dann noch mit einem Coop-Modus abgerundet, der seinesgleichen sucht! Respekt! - Selten so viel Spaß gehabt!

Einziges Kontra ist die kurze Spielzeit, doch auch hier hat sich Valve wieder etwas einfallen lassen und liefert einen, einfach zu handhabenden Map-Editor gleich mit, darüber hinaus kann man sich über den Workshop inzwischen mehr als 50.000 neue Levels downloaden.
A thinking man's game of satirical and respectable humor. Minimal redundance, clever physic puzzles, and an enjoyable, witty storyline.
SImplemente el mejor juego de puzles de la historia. EPICO
It is a good game and it has a lot of chambers.Also it has the coop mode that you can play more champers!

Amazing game with a very exciting story and gameplay. it makes you think in many different ways that you normally wouldn't think about and you need to really think about the problem from several different angles if you are going to make it trough the game. Well developed characters, and an extraordinary story make this game my favorite game evar, yes, spelled with an A. 11/10
first-person, puzzle-platform, video game, GO BUY IT

It is a perfect game.
It was the first one-player game I played after getting steam, if I recall correctly, and I must say that I chose my games very well.
I have this game, and Valve as a company (and Nintrendo) to thank for bringing me joy, and a glance into what videogaming could be, if the creator is creative and tallented enough.
I strive to one day publish a game that I can be proud of, as undoubtedly the Valve team working on this game was.

The portal mechanic works flawlessly, which is to be expected, but not entirely without questioning if you ask me. It is amazing how they made it so perfect, that I'm still scratching my head about what kind of a magic spell they used. If the portal mechanic wasn't flawless, the world would not have been as emersive as it is, and I feel sadness for even thinking of a reality where the young me was playing Portal 2 for the first time, trying to figure out how the portals worked, and even sort of understand how they were made, just by looking at them.

It is the most immersive level-based game of all time, and I am truly happy to have this game as a reference for when designing my own games.

PS: This review was published in 2012, but the review was re-written on 2017-12-22. The original review went something like this: "I love this game! I have nothing to complain about!"
Best puzzle game !
La suite de l'un des meilleurs jeux de Valve
SPAAAAAAAAAACE
Fera!

I just don't know what to say about this game. The story is very good. Wheatley's charm GLaDOS' sarcasm, and Cave Johnson's insane-ness make them very lovable characters. The storyline was great, and the ending provoked tears, mostly because the game was over and VALVe can't count to three. The multiplayer is fun too because you really have to think. To top it off, we recently got a new update which adds community maps to the game and more Cave Johnson. Overall, one of the best games in the history of games. Can't recommend it enough. 9.5/10
Portal 2 is actually the reason why Steve Jobs died: he couldn't finish it.

Portal1は、プロローグにすぎないことが、Portal2をクリアして思いました。
製作者は、Portal2を作りたくてPortal1を作ったんだなと。
前作で、不満であった、ボリュームの少なさ、エイムカーソルがない、白い枠に覆われたゲーム世界があまりなくなった等細かい所にも改良されていた。
今回、ストーリーがとても重視されシングルミッションでもやりごたえ十分でした。

この作品は、親子でわいわい見ても遊んでも楽しめると思った。
